long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Clammer extension lets you collect and share articles and article snippets from whatever page you're on. With the extension, you can:

- share an article highlight simply by highlighting the text you want to share and opening the extension.
- collect a highlight to view later or use in a reply.
- share a whole article.

Just download and open the extension to start clammering.


Privacy Policy: The Clammer extension does not and will never track your browsing activity. The only time the extension collects information is when you open it, and it only gets the page url, title, selection, and selection paragraph. This information will only be saved if you decide to post it to Clammer.
